meta_description: See, Hear, and Touch Baltimore's Story. The BMI tells the story of Baltimore, a place impacted as much by the worker as the work itself.
hours_text:
Visit The BMI[jacob@periscopeup.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116002244/https://www.thebmi.org/author/jacobperiscopeup-com/ "Posts by jacob@periscopeup.com")2025-10-23T10:40:07-04:00

### Plan Your Visit

Plan your visit to the BMI with ticket information, admission pricing, directions, parking information and visitor maps. Browse below for more information. We look forward to having you visit!

**Hours:**

  * Tuesday – Sunday 9am – 4pm
  * 3rd Wednesdays 4pm – 8pm **“Free Admission!”[Learn More](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116002244/https://www.thebmi.org/extended-hours/)**

Closed on Mondays, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve and Christmas Day

[Take A Virtual Tour!](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116002244/https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=kLEQYDXb8Jv)

## Admission

**Admission**

**Adult** – $15  
**Senior** [62+] – $10  
**Teacher, Student, or Youth**[6-17] – $8  
**BMI Members** – Always Free!

[Purchase and Reserve Your Ticket Today!__](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116002244/https://48278.blackbaudhosting.com/48278/page.aspx?pid=196&tab=3&txobjid=324fae11-46ac-4ca9-9118-303cfb409000)

[Click Here for Adult and School Group Details __](/web/20251116002244/https://www.thebmi.org/visit/groups/)

**Discounts**

The BMI is happy to offer free admission for:  
**Children 5 and under**  
**EBT and SNAP card holders**  
**Active duty military and veterans**  
Get your free tickets at the door, or call 410-727-4808 x0 to reserve a spot in advance.

collections_text:
The Baltimore Museum of Industry[jacob@periscopeup.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115044249/https://www.thebmi.org/author/jacobperiscopeup-com/ "Posts by jacob@periscopeup.com")2025-07-16T13:29:09-04:00

# Work Matters

The Baltimore Museum of Industry interprets the diverse and significant human stories behind labor and innovation in Baltimore, cultivating a sense of belonging and inspiring visitors to think critically about the intersection of work and society.

Located in an 1860s oyster cannery on a five-acre waterfront campus, the BMI offers dynamic indoor and outdoor exhibitions, live demonstrations, engaging tours, and hands-on activities for visitors of all ages.

[Purchase or Reserve Tickets __](http://web.archive.org/web/20260115044249/https://48278.blackbaudhosting.com/48278/page.aspx?pid=196&tab=3&txobjid=324fae11-46ac-4ca9-9118-303cfb409000&_gl=1*jfpkmb*_ga*MTgxNzU1NDg5MS4xNzEwODYxNjQy*_ga_PPRSKSR39F*MTcxMzkyMzAzMy4zNy4xLjE3MTM5MzAyNjQuNTMuMC4w)

[](/web/20260115044249/https://www.thebmi.org/exhibitions/)

__

#### Exhibitions

Explore BMI’s Exhibits

The exhibitions at the Baltimore Museum of Industry document the stories of the workers and entrepreneurs who built Baltimore into a manufacturing powerhouse.

[](/web/20260115044249/https://www.thebmi.org/programs-events/)
